name: ArtifactType
description: if the detailed artifact is a file

name: ArtifactType
description: if the detailed artifact is a framework

name: ArtifactType
description: if the detailed artifact is a library

name: ArtifactType
description: if the detailed artifact is an application

name: ArtifactType
description: if the detailed artifact is an operating system

name: ArtifactType
description: if the detailed artifact is a hardware device

name: ArtifactType
description: if the detailed artifact type doesn't fit into the above categories.

name: FileType
description: if the file is human readable source code (.c, .html, etc.)

name: FileType
description: if the file is a compiled object, target image or binary executable (.o, .a, etc.)

name: FileType
description: if the file represents an archive (.tar, .jar, etc.)

name: FileType
description: if the file is associated with a specific application type (MIME type of application/*)

name: FileType
description: if the file is associated with an audio file (MIME type of audio/* , e.g. .mp3)

name: FileType
description: if the file is human readable text file (MIME type of text/*)

name: FileType
description: if the file is associated with an picture image file (MIME type of image/*, e.g., .jpg, .gif)

name: FileType
description: if the file is associated with a video file type (MIME type of video/*)

name: FileType
description: if the file serves as documentation

name: FileType
description: if the file is an SPDX document

name: FileType
description: if the file doesn't fit into the above categories (generated artifacts, data files, etc.)

name: PopulationMethod
description: if the SBOM document was created by human declaration when it is created.

name: PopulationMethod
description: if the SBOM document was created by an automated process when it is created.

name: PopulationMethod
description: if the SBOM document was created by investigating the artifact to retrieve as much information as possible.

name: PopulationMethod
description: if the population method doesn't fit into the above categories.

name: HashType
description: if the algorithm is SHA1.

name: HashType
description: if the algorithm is SHA-256.

name: HashType
description: if the algorithm is SHA-512.

name: HashType
description: if the algorithm is MD5.

name: HashType
description: if the algorithm doesn't fit into the above categories.

name: SignatureMethod
description: in case of RSA Probabilistic signature scheme signature method.

name: SignatureMethod
description: in case of Elliptic curve digital signature algorithm based on TwistedEdwards curves signature method.

name: SignatureMethod
description: if the signature method doesn't fit into the above categories.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element contains the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is contained by the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is a descendant of (same lineage but postdates) the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is an ancestor of (same lineage but pre-dates) the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is a variant of (same lineage but not clear which came first) the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is an exact copy of the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is a patch file for (to be applied to) the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is a patch file that has been applied to the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element dynamically links to the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element statically links to the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element has as a prerequisite the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is a prerequisite for the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is a test case used in testing the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is used to build the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is used to test the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is used to develop the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is a data file used in the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is a metafile of the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element was generated from the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element generates the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is expanded from the archive owner of the Relationship.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element provides documentation of the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is an optional component of the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is packaged into the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the target element amends the SBOM information in the source element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is a file added to the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is a file that was modified from the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element is a file deleted from the target element.

name: RelationshipType
description: is to be used when the source element comes after the target element (useful for relationships between action artifacts).

name: RelationshipType
description: if the relationship doesn't fit into the above categories.

name: AnnotationType
description: in case of general comments.

name: AnnotationType
description: in case of topics, keywords, ... to associate with an element.

name: AnnotationType
description: if the external reference type doesn't fit into the above categories.

name: BuildType
description: in case of commit activity.

name: BuildType
description: in case of compile activity.

name: BuildType
description: in case of link activity.

name: BuildType
description: if the build type doesn't fit into the above categories.

name: AssessmentType
description: in case of vulnerability scan.

name: AssessmentType
description: if the assessment type doesn't fit into the above categories.

name: LicenseInformationType
description: in case of declared license information.

name: LicenseInformationType
description: in case of concluded license information.

name: LicenseInformationType
description: in case of distributed license information.

name: LicenseInformationType
description: if the license information doesn't fit into the above categories.
